About Mulesoft
 
Anypoint Platform is the only complete platform that lets companies realize business transformation through API-led connectivity. It is a unified, flexible enterprise application integration platform that solves the most challenging connectivity problems across SOA, SaaS and APIs in a low-friction, developer-friendly way. With Any point Platform and its API-led connectivity approach, you can integrate apps, data, and devices anywhere, on-prem or in the cloud.
 
Why MuleSoft
MuleSoft is the only platform leader in 3 Gartner Magic Quadrant which forms the basis of any Hybrid Integration platform.
Advantages
 
  • One runtime for your ESB, API Gateway, Registry, Management needs
  • Integrations on Prem and deploy them on cloud and vice versa with ease
  • Easy deployment using Dockers containers
  • Supports Continuous integration using Jenkin and Maven
  • More reliance and support for open source platforms like Active MQ, kafka, Mongo DB etc
  • 150+ connectors to connect to cloud SaaS,on prem applications
